revised_title: Cross-Property Bounds for Conductivity and Bulk Modulus of Isotropic Composite Materials
tldr: The authors derive rigorous cross-property bounds that connect the effective electrical conductivity and the effective bulk modulus of any isotropic two-phase composite. These bounds are useful for estimating effective properties of composites and can be applied to various situations and microgeometries. The bounds are also applicable to anisotropic composites with cubic symmetry.
